title: Subchapter A - Sales Of Bonds And Notes; Debt Statements
content:
Subchapter A - Sales Of Bonds And Notes; Debt Statements

State Regulations

Part 25 - Requirements For Notice Of Sale Of Bonds By Municipalities, School Districts And District Corporations (§ 25.1 to 25.8 to 25.9)

Part 26 - Requirements For Notice Of Sale Of Notes By Municipalities, School Districts And District Corporations (§ 26.0 to 26.4)

Part 27 - Requirements For The Preparation And Filing Of Official Statements (§ 27.1 to 27.13)

Part 28 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By Cities Having More Than 125,000 Inhabitants (§ 28.1 to 28.2)

Part 29 - Annual And Supplemental Debt Statements For Housing And Urban Renewal Purposes To Be Used By Cities, Towns And Villages (§ 29.1 to 29.2)

Part 30 - Certificate Of The Chief Fiscal Officer Relating To The Issuance Of Urban Renewal Notes (§ 30.1 to 30.2)

Part 31 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By Counties, Towns, Villages And Cities Having Less Than 125,000 Inhabitants (§ 31.1 to 31.3)

Part 32 - Requirements For Notice Of Transfer And Sale Of Delinquent Real Estate Tax Receivables (§ 32.1 to 32.4)

Part 33 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By School Districts (§ 33.1 to 33.3)

Part 34 - Debt Statement Forms To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By School Districts In Cities Under 125,000 Inhabitants (§ 34.1 to 34.3)

Part 35 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By Fire Districts (§ 35.1 to 35.3)

Part 36 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By School Districts Outside Of Cities (§ 36.1 to 36.2)

Part 37 - Negotiated Sales Of Variable Rate Obligations And Bonds Sold At A Discount (§ 37.1 to 37.6)

Part 38 - Sinking Funds For Bonds Of Municipalities And School Districts (§ 38.1 to 38.20)

Part 39 - Installment Purchase Contracts By Political Subdivisions (§ 39.0 to 39.10)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
